content.text:
Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term describes reading aloud in unison or parts with a whole class, small group, or individual students so that students hear the text at the same time they read it?

A. Choral Reading
B. Literature Circle
C. Readers Theatre
D. Shared Reading

The term that describes reading aloud in unison or parts with a whole class, small group, or individual students so that students hear the text at the same time they read it is:

A. Choral Reading

Choral reading involves a group of students reading a text together, often in unison, which helps them practice fluency and expression while hearing the text simultaneously.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
